citations.narrative:
A large fallen tree has damaged the top rail and fence fabric of the dividing fence between the white-tailed deer
enclosures near the maintenance building. The damaged top rail and fence fabric leave this fence structurally
unsound and in disrepair. This damaged fence must be repaired or replaced to maintain structural strength, contain
the deer and protect them from injury.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: AUGUST 31, 2019
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representatives.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
A large fallen tree has damaged the top rail and fence fabric of the dividing fence between the white-tailed deer
enclosures near the maintenance building.  The damaged top rail and fence fabric leave this fence structurally
unsound and in disrepair.  This damaged fence must be repaired or replaced to maintain structural strength, contain
the deer and protect them from injury.
TO BE CORRECTED BY:   AUGUST 31, 2019
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representatives.
